title: UFC : most knockdowns landed by fighters worldwide as of March 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of knockdowns landed for 10 number of Months.
Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed and Thiago Alves has the lowest Number of knockdowns landed.
The Number of knockdowns landed of Month Thiago Alves is 1.54% smaller than the maximum value at Donald Cerrone.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of knockdowns landed in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of knockdowns landed is appeared to be the highest at Month Donald Cerrone and lowest at Month Thiago Alves.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of knockdowns landed for 10 number of Months.
Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed and Thiago Alves has the lowest Number of knockdowns landed.
The Number of knockdowns landed of Month Thiago Alves is 1.54% smaller than the maximum value at Donald Cerrone.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of knockdowns landed in the y axis.
The Number of knockdowns landed is appeared to be the highest at Month Donald Cerrone and lowest at Month Thiago Alves.
The second highest Number of knockdowns landed is appeared to be the Month .
The difference of Number of knockdowns landed between the highest and lowest Month is 7.0.
Number of knockdowns landed at Month Donald Cerrone is 20.0 , second place is  at 20.0, and thirdly is Jeremy Stephens at 18.0.
Overall Number of knockdowns landed has reduced over the Months.
Month Junior Dos Santos, Chuck Liddell, Lyoto Machida, and Mauricio Rua have the same Number of knockdowns landed.
The highest value 20.0 at Donald Cerrone is almost 1.32 times larger than the average value 15.1.
